ComicInfo.Title: All in a Sea of Wonders; Day of Blood Prelude
ComicInfo.Series: Star Trek Free Comic Book Day
ComicInfo.Summary:
All in a Sea of Wonders: The lower decks crew enjoy down time on the holodeck, first in a Dixon Hill adventure, then in a Sherlock Holmes adventure. Beckett tries to show how the holodeck safeguards will prevent them from creating a real threat, however, during a glitch with the ship's systems, the safeguards are overwritten, and they accidentally create a sentient Dracula.
Day of Blood Prelude: Captain Meyerson represents Starfleet at a Klingon Ceremony of Honor, which is suddenly interrupted by an attack from the Klingon rogue group known as Red Path.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-18 05:13:43. [CVDB988033] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:56:08. [Issue ID 2526974]
